operator_pipelines.description: Automatic workload pipeline for localizing a file per partition to each executor of cluster
Automatic workload pipeline for localizing either a file or directory shared within cluster in a single node cluster
Automatic workload pipeline for localizing either a file or directory shared within task in a single node cluster
File-based BAM workload pipeline with all BAM records in a single partition
File-based BAM workload pipeline with reads on GRCH38 primary chromosome parallelized into 23 partitions (one autosome per partition, and chrX, chrY, and chrM merged into a single partition)
File-based BAM workload pipeline with reads on GRCH38 reference genome parallelized into 3,101 contiguous unmasked regions
File-based BAM workload pipeline with reads on GRCH38 reference genome parallelized into 50 contiguous unmasked regions

File-based BAM workload pipeline with reads on GRCH38 reference genome parallelized into 50 contiguous unmasked regions, where both reads in a read pair are presented in each partition for analyses (e.g., read consensus)
File-based BAM workload pipeline with reads on HG19 primary chromosome parallelized into 23 partitions (one autosome per partition, and chrX, chrY, and chrM merged into a single partition)
File-based BAM workload pipeline with reads on HG19 reference genome chr20 parallelized into 45 contiguous unmasked regions
File-based BAM workload pipeline with reads on HG19 reference genome parallelized into 155 contiguous unmasked regions

File-based BAM workload pipeline with reads on HG19 reference genome parallelized into 155 contiguous unmasked regions, where both reads in a read pair are presented in each partition for analyses (e.g., read consensus)
File-based BAM workload pipeline with reads on HG19 reference genome parallelized into 3,109 contiguous unmasked regions
File-based BAM workload pipeline with reads on HG19 reference genome parallelized into 77 contiguous unmasked regions
File-based BAM workload pipeline with unmapped BAM records in a single partition
File-based Delta Lake workload pipeline
File-based FASTQ workload parallelization pipeline with 1,048,576 read records for each partition
File-based VCF workload pipeline using Glow and Delta Lake
File-based VCF workload pipeline with GRCH38 primary chromosome parallelized into 23 partitions (one autosome per partition, and chrX, chrY, and chrM merged into a single partition)",
File-based VCF workload pipeline with GRCh38 reference genome parallelized into 155 contiguous unmasked regions
File-based VCF workload pipeline with GRCh38 reference genome parallelized into 3,101 contiguous unmasked regions
File-based VCF workload pipeline with GRCH38 reference genome with all VCF records in a single partition
File-based VCF workload pipeline with HG19 primary chromosome parallelized into 23 partitions (one autosome per partition, and chrX, chrY, and chrM merged into a single partition)
File-based VCF workload pipeline with HG19 reference genome parallelized into 155 contiguous unmasked regions
File-based VCF workload pipeline with HG19 reference genome parallelized into 3,109 contiguous unmasked and unpadded regions
File-based VCF workload pipeline with HG19 reference genome parallelized into 3,109 contiguous unmasked regions
File-based VCF workload pipeline with HG19 reference genome with all VCF records in a single partition
